Configuration.Name: Relentless Overdues
Configuration.Author: Andrew Morgan
Configuration.Description: Continues to send overdue notices to patrons after the third overdue notice. The days and time the e-mails are sent are specified in the settings.

Setting.name: EmailName
Setting.Description: Name of the e-mail template to use.

Setting.name: StartDay
Setting.Description: Number of days an item has to be overdue before these e-mails begin to be sent.

Setting.name: Time
Setting.Description: Time e-mails are sent. 24-hour format: for example, 1:15PM would be 1315. 8:00AM would be 0800.

Setting.name: Interval
Setting.Description: Day(s) e-mails are sent. Format is a day of the week (Monday, Tuesday, etc.).

Setting.name: Exclusions
Setting.Description: NVTGCs to exclude from Relentless Overdues. Enclose in single quotes, and separate multiple NVTGCs with commas. Example: 'ex1', 'ex2', 'ex3'
